features: A Great Gift Idea for Boys一Boys are born to be interested in excavators and construction vehicles. A building set toy not only can enhances kids engineering and math skills, but also your boys will gain self -confidence and be proud of himself by building his favorite toys. Makes a great birthday, Christmas gift for ages 5 6 7 8 and up kids.

6 in 1 DIY Building Groups 一 An action-packed construction site play kit, it features 6 models engineering vehicles with 114 building blocks. Boys will become creative builders as they use these color toys to build excavator, helicopter, crane, loader.

STEM Education Through Playing 一 Fun and interesting educational toys are designed to improve your children's Science, Technology, Engineering, and Math skills through playing. Keeping children engaging for 1-2 hours each day can enhance his concentration and hand-eye coordination, develop their independent, confident and practical ability.

Easy to Assemble and Organize 一 The erector building sets come with tools and clear step-by-step guide with photos of the models that can be followed. Player can entertains himself by building toys independently.
What You Will Get 一 This building kit contains 112 parts and 2 tools, instruction manual, a sturdy box, our worry-free 12-month warranty, and friendly customer service.
body.description: Creative STEM Building Toys Kit Strengthen Parent-Child Interaction Mom and Dad work together to build various creations, helping to strengthen parent-child relationships and communication by playing with this building set. Parents can learn more about kids' real thoughts and interests and help them build self-confidence and gain a sense of achievement after completing different creations. Family’s Happy Moment Kids, Mom and Dad work together to build various creations. Definitely gets kids off tablet, iPad or computer game, enjoying every moment with family and using their own imagination, enthusiasm and curiosity about construction and science knowledge by playing these building toys kit.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: HomeTTER concentrates on giving each girl and boy a happy childhood all the time.

A rewarding experience for kids aged 5 and up Kids can enjoy exciting building fun with this brilliant creator 6in1 engineering series playset. Kids will also gain self -confidence and be proud of himself by building their favorite toys. Makes a great birthday, Christmas gift for ages 5 6 7 8 9 and up kids. Multiple children to play together, encourage each other to move on to next project, facilitate their cooperation with other kids, enhancing their sense of cooperation and sharing.
HOMETTER 114 building parts can be assembled into six basic models: excavator, loader, crane, helicopter, tip lorry

Creative STEM Building Toys Kit Strengthen Parent-Child Interaction Mom and Dad work together to build various creations, helping to strengthen parent-child relationships and communication by playing with this building set. Parents can learn more about kids' real thoughts and interests and help them build self-confidence and gain a sense of achievement after completing different creations. Family’s Happy Moment Kids, Mom and Dad work together to build various creations. Definitely gets kids off tablet, iPad or computer game, enjoying every moment with family and using their own imagination, enthusiasm and curiosity about construction and science knowledge by playing these building toys kit. Practical DIY Learning Game Play and Entertainment Creativity and Imagination Hand-Eye Coordination Fine Motor Skills Logical Thinking Problem Solving Teamwork & Collaboration

Completely Safe STEM Learning Toys for Kids 5 6 7 8 9 10 11 12 and up Years Sturdy and well made made from food grade ABS plastic material which is also non-toxic, washable, tasteless and durable. What's in the package? 112 x parts building blocks1 x Wrench1 x Screwdriver1 x User Manual1 x storage box

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought for my nephew who is 6 and I have gotten great feedback and pictures from them of the different things they have made. Product made of good quality and was easy to follow directions:

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great engaging toddler activity
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This is a fun and engaging activity for your toddlers. The ability to make multiple Trox engages your child’s creativity while also teaching them life skills of building this project. This project is a little intense with the instruction so I would encourage an adult to be present to help, but overall a great family activity.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Wouldn’t buy this for anyone under the age of 8
reviews.reviewText: This was a fun project to do with My 6 year old nephew. But I ended up doing more of the work than he did. Instructions are a little tricky for younger children to work on alone. And the pieces sometimes looked different than what was being shown on the booklet.Overall he had fun, but he did give up a few times. This is better suited for an older child

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hours of fun
reviews.reviewText: Bought as a gift for my god son. He loves making different things out of this toy and spends hours reconfiguring it. It’s well made and has stood up well to him launching it across the room. Definitely a good toy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Concept is cute but the instructions are not always clear about placement. Length of screws may not have been thought out as it doesn’t allow enough room for securing . (Pieces come apart easily ) cheap pieces bow when putting on tracks . My five year old is excellent with these types of toys but I even had a hard time with the instructions and assembly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great construction kid
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a construction kid for my grandson (6 years old) and this one is the easiest you can find.The 10 designs are very nice and different from each other. The only inconvenient is that their instructions are hard to read because of their small size.However, costumer service was great. First, they sent me the full letter size, manual of instructions and then they resend me the manual with the activities in order from the easiest to the hardest. For your convenience, this is the order they sent me: 5th, 6th, 4th, 9th, 1st, 2nd, 3rd, 7th, 8th, 10th (these are the position of the machine in the instructions).It is a learning process, so I helped my grandson to build a few, not necesarily in the order above.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great toy, but tiny and cryptic instructions
reviews.reviewText: Got this for my son, who loves to wield a screwdriver and twist nuts and bolts with the earnest enthusiasm of an underage unpaid 5-year old laborer.The assembly aspect is great: The many projects are fun to build; they’re sturdy and functional when done, the pieces fit together properly, and once built, he has a lot of fun rearranging parts to suit his imagination.The major problem is that the instructions are impossible for a kid to follow, and were very difficult for ME to follow. There is a lot of guesswork involved. They are in image format, and they are tiny. Also, the images are very poorly angled in their presentation - meaning that the part where you are supposed to insert a screw, bend a plastic piece, or whatever, may well be hidden from view - you’ll see the front of a 3D image with an arrow pointing somewhere behind the surface layer. So I have to sit with my son and guide him through the steps, and occasionally, frustratingly back-track a few steps with “Oops, Mommy made a mistake, this piece actually goes into the 5th hole, not the 3rd, I just had to guess because the picture didn’t show us….”He certainly doesn’t mind making the revisions, but there’s a limit to how much patience the adult has…

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My nephew liked it a lot.
reviews.reviewText: Got it for a 3 year old. Right now it’s a little bit too advanced for him to fully build the stuff by himself but he loves playing with the crane. Soon enough he’ll be taking them apart and rebuilding them constantly.
Le encantos mi nieto, muy buen juguete

Spielzeug kam wie angekündigt. Unser Enkel hat nach dem Auspacken sofort mit dem Bauen angefangen.Mittlerweile wurden schon einige Fahrzeuge nachgebaut. Die Anleitung müsste größer sein ohne Lupe kann man nichts erkennen.
jeu très bien pour un enfant de 6/7 ans

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love this product, comes in a lovely carry case, has lots of different levels of difficulty to make allowing child to start off with the easy builds to increase their confidence, the parts themselves are of a good quality and are robust not flimsy that can break easy. Think this product is excellent value for money and will definitely be buying more in the sets available
Leider ist es nicht ganz altersgerechte, mein Neffe (4) konnte das leider noch nicht so gut, ohne Hilfe wäre da gar nicht dran zu denken
